column100:
You’re a UX champion and born leader, ready for your next challenge. We’re a fast-growing global SaaS scale-up, and we need your skills to make our platform shine. Apply today, and let’s get to work. 
 About us 
 Queue-it is a tech scale-up that helps the world’s biggest brands manage their busiest days. Our virtual waiting rooms prevent website crashes and bot abuse to create a smoother, fairer online experience for billions of users. 
 Queue-it is a place where you can do what you are naturally best at to positively maintain your performance. We’re a diverse team coming from 50+ countries with offices in Denmark, the U.S., and Australia. 
 About the role 
 As Head of Product Design, you’ll lead a team of talented UX Designers to improve the experience of billions of online visitors to the world’s biggest companies. You’ll prioritize and strategize UX projects and remove any obstacles standing in your team’s way. 
 We’re in our scale-up phase, so you’ll have a say in big projects, like building out our product organization. You can put your UX and leadership skills to work, knowing you’re making a big impact and supporting our mission of delivering online fairness for all. 
 Responsibilities 
 Strategize and prioritize UX projects. Lead your team to success by setting a clear direction for improving the user experience of our services. You and your team will work with our development and marketing teams to optimize UX across our platforms and deliver UX guidance across the organization. 
 Exemplify developer leadership. With an “experience leadership” mindset, you’ll empower your team by clearing obstacles, supporting/elevating their initiatives, and providing ambitious (but achievable) goals. You’ll keep the team accountable to processes and deliveries. 
 Qualifications 
 5+ years experience in a UX designer role, ideally in the B2B and/or SaaS space 
 Previous experience leading a team 
 A wealth of UX knowledge and hands-on experience with product design and branding 
 Fluent with the latest design tools (we use Figma) and data visualization user interfaces 
 Experience working with user research and user-centered design 
 Solid verbal and written communication skills in English (Danish not required) 
 We are looking for someone who has 
 Proven leadership experience 
 Proven experience with planning and executing high-level strategy 
 Outstanding presentation and stakeholder management skills to communicate the value of design internally and externally 
 A strong interest in technology and internet services 
 A proactive mindset and a drive to bring tasks to completion, as well as the flexibility to effectively switch between independent tasks and teamwork. 
 Why you'll love working with Queue-it 
 Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next. 
 Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way. 
 Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs. In a company with 50+ nationalities, you will be able to enjoy a truly intercultural and inclusive environment. 
 About the office 
 Located in the heart of Copenhagen, the Queue-it headquarters offers modern amenities, collaborative spaces, and quiet zones to suit all work styles – plus games, ping pong, foosball, PS4, social events, clubs, and great coffee, lunch, & snacks! 
 -- 
 Apply today! 
 Please submit all materials in English 
 Due to GDPR regulations, we cannot accept applications/CVs via email. Please apply online to be considered. 
 Queue-it is committed to employing a diverse staff. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability. 
 Department 
 Technology 
 Role 
 Head of Product Design 
 Locations 
 Copenhagen - DK 
 Employment type 
 Full-time 
 Language 
 English
